name: Car Race (CreatingGames)
description:
This game is called Car Race. This is a remake of a game from the book ‘Terrible Old Games You’ve Probably Never Heard Of’. The game is all about, how far can you go. 

You go around the track, racing against other AI. 

You will lose fuel along the way. 

However, there are jerry cans around the track, you can use to refill. 

The more fuel, further the distance, the higher the score.

Please give feedback on how you thought the remake went. 

Controls:

WASD - Forward, Left, Reverse/Brake, Right

Numbers 1 to 4 - Change Camera View

Spacebar - Brake

Escape - Pause
